dashboard.title: Welcome back, {{name}}
dashboard.subtitle: Here is a quick overview of your current permit activity.

hdabQueue.title: HDAB Action Queue
hdabQueue.subtitle: Permits awaiting HDAB review or follow-up.
hdabQueue.empty: No permits require HDAB action at this time.

researcherGrid.title: My Projects
researcherGrid.empty: You are not assigned to any active permits. When you join a project, it will show up here.

dataHolderIngress.title: Data Ingress Assignments
dataHolderIngress.empty: You are not currently assigned to any active data ingress workflows. HDAB will notify you when new uploads are required.

actionLog.title: Recent activity
actionLog.errorFallback: Unable to load activity history at this time.

states.noPermitAccess: Activity will appear once you have access to a permit with sensitive actions to review.
states.noPermitSelected: Select a permit to review its recent sensitive activity.
states.empty: No sensitive actions have been recorded for this permit yet.

helper.hdab: Monitor sensitive actions across HDAB permits requiring oversight.
helper.member: Track workspace and egress updates submitted by your team.
helper.dataHolder: Keep track of ingress updates for your assigned permits.

auditLog.title: Activity log
auditLog.subtitle: Review sensitive actions recorded for your selected permit. Filters default to recent history so the log stays fast and readable.
auditLog.subtitleWithReference: Review sensitive actions recorded for your selected permit ({{reference}}). Filters default to recent history so the log stays fast and readable.

states.noAccess: Sensitive activity will appear once you are assigned to a permit.
states.noPermit: Select a permit to view its activity log.
states.empty: No activity matches the selected filters yet.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to view this page. Please contact your SPE administrator if you think this is a mistake.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you were looking for does not exist or has been moved.

login.title: SPE Portal Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue to the Secure Processing Environment.

myPermits.title: My Permits
myPermits.subtitle: A consolidated view of your assigned permits with quick access to active workspaces and outputs.

dataIngress.title: Data Ingress Tasks
dataIngress.subtitle: Review the permits you are supporting and upload requested datasets when the ingress window opens.

list.title: Permit Queue
list.subtitle: Review all permits assigned to the HDAB team.

hdabTeam.title: HDAB Team
hdabTeam.empty: No HDAB staff have been assigned to this permit yet.

outputs.changesRequested: HDAB requested updates on {{count}} submission. Submit a revised folder when ready.
outputs.changesRequested_plural: HDAB requested updates on {{count}} submissions. Submit revised folders when ready.
outputs.emptyApproved: No outputs have been approved yet. Approved folders will appear here once HDAB finalises their decision.
outputs.emptyPending: No outputs have been submitted yet. When you send a folder for review, it will appear here with its status.
outputs.summary: {{approved}} approved | {{pending}} awaiting review | {{changesRequested}} with requested updates

reviewPanel.title: Egress Review Queue
reviewPanel.description: Review pending submissions and document your decision. Researchers are notified automatically when you approve or request changes.
reviewPanel.readOnly: You have read-only access to the egress queue.
reviewPanel.noPendingInfo: Decisions can be recorded once submissions are awaiting review.
reviewPanel.empty: No outputs have been submitted yet. When the research team sends a folder for review it will appear here with its status.
reviewPanel.summary: {{approved}} approved • {{pending}} awaiting review • {{changesRequested}} with requested updates

alerts.changesRequested: {{count}} submission is awaiting researcher updates before it can be approved.
alerts.changesRequested_plural: {{count}} submissions are awaiting researcher updates before they can be approved.

errors.noPermission: You do not have permission to record decisions.
errors.noPending: There are no pending submissions available to review.
errors.commentsRequired: Comments are required when requesting rework.
errors.submit: Failed to record review decision. Please try again.

comments.label: Reviewer comments
comments.placeholder: Document the approval rationale or required changes.
comments.helper: Comments are optional for approvals and required for rework requests.

dataHolderPanel.title: Project Contacts
dataHolderPanel.subtitle: Reach out if you have questions about the data transfer.

detail.notFound: No permit found for the provided identifier.

dataHolder.overviewDescription: Review the key details for this transfer.

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.subtitle: Add or remove collaborators on this permit. Invitations are routed through the SPE provisioning workflow.

hdabTeamDialog.title: Manage HDAB Team
hdabTeamDialog.description: Assign HDAB staff to this permit with the appropriate functional role. Staff members only gain access to the permit when explicitly assigned.

errors.search: Unable to search HDAB staff. Please try again.

success.remove: HDAB team member removed from the permit.

hdabTeamDialog.empty: No HDAB staff are currently assigned to this permit.

dataHolderManagement.title: Data Holder Management
dataHolderManagement.subtitle: Invite or remove data holders responsible for uploading source extracts for this permit.

dialog.title: Assign Data Holder
dialog.searchHelper: Only users with the data holder access role appear in this list.
dialog.noInput: Enter at least two characters to search.
dialog.searchError: Unable to search for data holders right now.

submitOutput.title: Submit Output for Review
submitOutput.subtitle: Provide the secure workspace folder path containing files ready for egress review along with a justification describing the contents and purpose of the export. You can submit multiple folders concurrently while HDAB staff review your outputs.
submitOutput.notFound: Permit not found or you do not have access to submit outputs.

form.justificationHelper: Describe the files included and why they need to leave the secure environment.
form.missingJustification: Please provide a justification for the egress request.
form.success: Output submitted for review. Tracking ID: {{id}}
form.error: Failed to submit output. Ensure the path is correct.

hdab.title: HDAB Review Actions
hdab.description: Provide a decision to progress the permit review. All decisions are audited.

member.title: Researcher Actions
member.description: Launch your secure workspace or submit deliverables for egress review.

dataHolder.title: Data Ingress Actions
dataHolder.description: Upload the requested dataset extracts and confirm once the transfer is complete.

fallbackInfoMessages.hdab: No HDAB actions are available until the project team completes their next step.
fallbackInfoMessages.member: There are no direct actions required for your project at this stage.
fallbackInfoMessages.dataHolder: No actions are currently required. You will be notified when uploads are needed.

defaultSuccessMessages.confirmIngress: Upload confirmed. HDAB will continue processing.

defaultErrorMessages.submitSetup: Failed to submit workspace for review.

hdab.AWAITING_INGRESS: Assign a data holder and initiate the secure transfer to begin preparation.
hdab.INGRESS_IN_PROGRESS: Monitor the data holder upload. Mark the ingress complete once files are validated.
hdab.DATA_PREPARATION_PENDING: Complete the preparation workspace and submit when data is ready for review.
hdab.DATA_PREPARATION_REWORK: Revisit the preparation workspace and resubmit when issues are resolved.
hdab.DATA_PREPARATION_REVIEW_PENDING: Review the preparation materials and record your decision.
hdab.WORKSPACE_SETUP_PENDING: Coordinate workspace configuration with the project team and submit when ready for review.
hdab.WORKSPACE_SETUP_REWORK: Address the requested setup changes and resubmit for review.
hdab.WORKSPACE_SETUP_REVIEW_PENDING: Review the configured workspace and record your decision.
hdab.ANALYSIS_ACTIVE: Review pending egress submissions while the research team continues their analysis.
hdab.ANALYSIS_PAUSED: Project activity is paused. No HDAB action is required.

member.AWAITING_INGRESS: HDAB will contact your nominated data holder to begin the secure upload.
member.INGRESS_IN_PROGRESS: The data holder is transferring files. HDAB will notify you when preparation starts.
member.DATA_PREPARATION_PENDING: HDAB staff are preparing your datasets. You will be notified when review begins.
member.DATA_PREPARATION_REVIEW_PENDING: HDAB reviewers are checking the prepared data before environment setup can start.
member.DATA_PREPARATION_REWORK: HDAB staff requested updates to the preparation dataset.
member.WORKSPACE_SETUP_PENDING: Configure the workspace and submit once you are ready for HDAB review.
member.WORKSPACE_SETUP_REWORK: Address the requested changes, then resubmit your environment for review.
member.WORKSPACE_SETUP_REVIEW_PENDING: HDAB reviewers are evaluating your workspace setup.
member.ANALYSIS_ACTIVE: Launch the workspace to continue analysis. Monitor egress submissions below and send additional folders whenever you are ready.
member.ANALYSIS_PAUSED: Resume the project to continue working in the workspace.

dataHolder.AWAITING_INGRESS: Await confirmation from HDAB to begin the secure upload of the requested extracts.
dataHolder.INGRESS_IN_PROGRESS: Upload the prepared data through the secure channel, then confirm once the transfer is complete.
dataHolder.DATA_PREPARATION_PENDING: HDAB is processing your uploaded files. No further action is required right now.

DATA_PREPARATION_REVIEW_PENDING.label: Approve Preparation
DATA_PREPARATION_REVIEW_PENDING.successMessage: Preparation approved. Permit now awaiting workspace setup.

WORKSPACE_SETUP_PENDING.label: Submit Setup for Review
WORKSPACE_SETUP_PENDING.successMessage: Workspace setup submitted for HDAB review.

WORKSPACE_SETUP_REWORK.label: Resubmit Setup for Review
WORKSPACE_SETUP_REWORK.successMessage: Workspace setup resubmitted for HDAB review.

WORKSPACE_SETUP_REVIEW_PENDING.label: Approve Setup
WORKSPACE_SETUP_REVIEW_PENDING.successMessage: Workspace setup approved. Analysis can begin.

WORKSPACE_SETUP_PENDING.label: Submit Setup for Review
WORKSPACE_SETUP_PENDING.successMessage: Workspace setup submitted for HDAB review.

WORKSPACE_SETUP_REWORK.label: Resubmit Setup for Review
WORKSPACE_SETUP_REWORK.successMessage: Workspace setup resubmitted for HDAB review.

workspace.notFound: Permit not found or you do not have workspace access.
workspace.description: Manage your secure workspace session. Actions are limited by your role:

roleDescriptions.hdab: HDAB reviewers can connect to review sessions.
roleDescriptions.member: Researchers can start sessions and submit outputs.

workspace.hdabBanner: HDAB reviewers access workspaces in a view-only mode for compliance checks. All interactions are audited.

utilities.title: Workspace Guidance
utilities.description: All file and data management must occur within the secure Guacamole session provided for this workspace.

guacamole.pendingConnection: Workspace is not yet connected. Start the environment to obtain connection details.
guacamole.title: Guacamole Connection

errors.connectionPending: Workspace is starting; connection not ready yet.
